hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT service || '-' || status as ID , service, status, count(id) as COUNT FROM lau_inbox WHERE RECEIVER_EBOX = :sedBox and STATUS in (:statuses) and SERVICE in (:services) and DATE_STATUS >= :fromDateChanged and DATE_STATUS <= :toDateChanged GROUP BY service, status ORDER BY service, status

SELECT service || '-' || status as ID , service, status, count(id) as COUNT FROM lau_outbox WHERE SENDER_EBOX = :sedBox and STATUS in (:statuses) and SERVICE in (:services) and DATE_STATUS >= :fromDateChanged and DATE_STATUS <= :toDateChanged GROUP BY service, status ORDER BY service, status
